name: The Great Geometric Multiverse Tour
description: LIBERATE THE GEOMETRIC PEOPLE AND SAVE THE MULTIVERSE! Fight through the randomly chosen universes of the Geometric Multiverse, arming yourself to the teeth with insane weaponry and mutating your mind, body, and soul with the unrelenting power of genetically altering pills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 128 MB Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Only Xbox360 and XboxOne controllers currently supported (But a mouse and keyboard are recommended anyways)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 3.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Only Xbox360 and XboxOne controllers currently supported (But a mouse and keyboard are recommended anyways)
